item.description:
This will be an off-leash hike. We will be hiking at a brisk pace and there are several hills that can be challenging. Bring water for the dogs and yourself. We will hike between 4-6 miles, so be prepared for this.

We will be starting the hike from the large parking lot, but you can park in either parking lot since parking is limited. I am in a blue Jeep Cherokee.

If you get lost on your way to the meet-up, please call my cell:
508-559-3677.
item.name: Duxbury Forest
